channel.title: Twitter Search / narendramodi
channel.description: Twitter feed for: narendramodi. Generated by TwitRSS.me

item.title: I will be reaching Kerala soon to take stock of the situation arising due to the unfortunate fire tragedy in Kollam.
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: I will be reaching Kerala soon to take stock of the situation arising due to the unfortunate fire tragedy in Kollam.

item.title: Have also asked my Cabinet colleague & Health Minister @JPNadda to immediately reach the site of the fire tragedy in Kollam.
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Have also asked my Cabinet colleague & Health Minister @JPNadda to immediately reach the site of the fire tragedy in Kollam.

item.title: Spoke to CM Oommen Chandy about the fire at a temple in Kollam. Arranging for immediate shifting of those critically injured via helicopter.
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Spoke to CM Oommen Chandy about the fire at a temple in Kollam. Arranging for immediate shifting of those critically injured via helicopter.

item.title: Fire at temple in Kollam is heart-rending & shocking beyond words. My thoughts are with families of the deceased & prayers with the injured.
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Fire at temple in Kollam is heart-rending & shocking beyond words. My thoughts are with families of the deceased & prayers with the injured.

item.title: Soni Chaurasia, a bright youngster from Kashi has made us very proud. Congratulations to her. http://nbt.in/2xZUbZ
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Soni Chaurasia, a bright youngster from Kashi has made us very proud. Congratulations to her. http://nbt.in/2xZUbZ

item.title: Vote BJP for good roads, education facilities, jobs, adequate medical care. Elect BJP for Assam's progress.https://amp.twimg.com/v/6c8b57d3-e6ee-443e-a00d-60e0d928dc95 …
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Vote BJP for good roads, education facilities, jobs, adequate medical care. Elect BJP for Assam's progress.https://amp.twimg.com/v/6c8b57d3-e6ee-443e-a00d-60e0d928dc95 …

item.title: Assam polls are not about who the next MLA will be. They are about Assam's future. India will grow when Assam grows. http://nm-4.com/vmul
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Assam polls are not about who the next MLA will be. They are about Assam's future. India will grow when Assam grows. http://nm-4.com/vmul

item.title: Misgovernance in Assam has led to people facing immense difficulties. A stable @BJP4India Govt in Assam will completely transform the state.
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Misgovernance in Assam has led to people facing immense difficulties. A stable @BJP4India Govt in Assam will completely transform the state.

item.title: People from all walks of life joined the rallies in Assam today. Happy to see so many youngsters participate.pic.twitter.com/7xT4UbstvK
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: People from all walks of life joined the rallies in Assam today. Happy to see so many youngsters participate.pic.twitter.com/7xT4UbstvK

item.title: Prayed to Maa Kamakhya, for the development of our nation & the wellbeing of our citizens.pic.twitter.com/AateokYHC3
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Prayed to Maa Kamakhya, for the development of our nation & the wellbeing of our citizens.pic.twitter.com/AateokYHC3

item.title: After many years, on first day of Navratri, getting an opportunity to visit Kamakhya Temple & offer prayers to Maa Kamakhya. Feeling blessed
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: After many years, on first day of Navratri, getting an opportunity to visit Kamakhya Temple & offer prayers to Maa Kamakhya. Feeling blessed

item.title: Today's Assam campaign includes rallies in Raha, Rangia, Sarbhog and Guwahati. @bjpassampradesh
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Today's Assam campaign includes rallies in Raha, Rangia, Sarbhog and Guwahati. @bjpassampradesh

item.title: Sajibu Cheiraoba greetings to the wonderful people of Manipur. May the new year fulfil all your wishes.
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Sajibu Cheiraoba greetings to the wonderful people of Manipur. May the new year fulfil all your wishes.

item.title: Navreh greetings to my fellow citizens. I pray that the coming year enhances the spirit of happiness and harmony in our lives.
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Navreh greetings to my fellow citizens. I pray that the coming year enhances the spirit of happiness and harmony in our lives.

item.title: On the special day of Ugadi, my greetings to everyone. I hope the new year brings peace & prosperity in our society.
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: On the special day of Ugadi, my greetings to everyone. I hope the new year brings peace & prosperity in our society.

item.title: Gudi Padwa wishes to all friends in Maharashtra. Praying for a phenomenal year, full of happiness and success.
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Gudi Padwa wishes to all friends in Maharashtra. Praying for a phenomenal year, full of happiness and success.

item.title: Wishing all my Sindhi friends on the auspicious occasion of Cheti Chand. We bow to Lord Jhulelal & seek his divine blessings.
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Wishing all my Sindhi friends on the auspicious occasion of Cheti Chand. We bow to Lord Jhulelal & seek his divine blessings.

item.title: Greetings to people across India celebrating the advent of the New Year. May this new year bring joy & prosperity.pic.twitter.com/SHuKbQ1xAA
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Greetings to people across India celebrating the advent of the New Year. May this new year bring joy & prosperity.pic.twitter.com/SHuKbQ1xAA

item.title: Ally with the Left in West Bengal & criticise them in Kerala…people can see through double standards of Congress. http://nm-4.com/iupl
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Ally with the Left in West Bengal & criticise them in Kerala…people can see through double standards of Congress. http://nm-4.com/iupl

item.title: Those in power in WB snatch people's money through chit funds. We have initiated Jan Dhan Yojana to give poor bank accounts & empower them.
item.dc:creator: Narendra Modi (@narendramodi)
item.description: Those in power in WB snatch people's money through chit funds. We have initiated Jan Dhan Yojana to give poor bank accounts & empower them.
